reviews.text: Magic Roofing & Construction Corp 1104 Stonewall Dr, Mansfield, TX 76063

"This company provides quality service and a high level of craftsmanship." "High quality work, good price, and in a timely manner." "Great experience from start to finish on my bathroom remodel."

The Magic Roofing crew did an outstanding job replacing my roof!  I found Chris to be incredibly fair, honest, responsive, and helpful throughout the entire process, from start to finish.  Will definitely work with him again.  Highly recommended!! More
Chris Durnin is fantastic. The roof looks fantastic and the crew moved quickly. They were able to help with my insurance claim and exceeded my expectations. Great job!

Our home a hit by a severe hail storm and Magic Roofing took care of everything for us. The owners are extremly nice and very professional. Chris was able to catch a lot of things our insurance company missed and made sure we got the best … More
